Over the weekend, the 23-year-old Olympic gymnast supported boyfriend Jonathan Owens, who played for the Houston Texans on Sunday in their loss against the C… [+976 chars]

articles.author: Gabe Friedman
articles.title: 'It's the mensch off the bench on Hanukkah!': Israeli Deni Avdija shines in first NBA preseason game - JTA News - Jewish Telegraphic Agency
articles.description: The Washington Wizards' Jewish announcer was impressed with the Israeli star's debut NBA performance.
